function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to handling and use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases if proper sanitation and handling protocols are not followed","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation of PPE, proper handling and disposal protocols, and training on hygiene practices","Technologies":"3D printing for eco-friendly and customizable PPE, smart sensors for feedback on PPE usage","People":"Healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate testing methods for contagious diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate diagnosis, leading to the spread of disease and ineffective treatment","Mitigation":"Development of accurate and rapid testing methods, validation of testing procedures, and widespread availability of testing facilities","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic technologies, rapid testing devices","People":"Healthcare providers, individuals seeking testing","Owner":"Medical research institutions, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of effective medical treatment for contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased mortality rates, prolonged illness, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Research and development of effective treatments, clinical trials, and accessibility to innovative medical interventions","Technologies":"Biopharmaceuticals, vaccine development, novel therapeutic approaches","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"}]}
